TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TitleStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class TitleStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 指定区域中 Web 部件控件的标题栏的样式特性。

span.span: Specifies the style characteristics for the title bars of Web Parts controls within a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于与区域指定适用于 Web 部件的标题栏区域内的控件的常见样式特征。The class is used with zones to specify common style characteristics that apply to the title bars of Web Parts controls within the zones. 属性包含对引用每个区域的对象。The property contains a reference to a object for each zone. 控件的标题栏将呈现在运行时作为 HTML 表单元格。A title bar for a control is rendered at run time as an HTML table cell. 因为类继承自类，它允许您设置的标题栏的样式属性类似于任何表格单元格的属性。Because the class inherits from the class, it allows you to set stylistic attributes for a title bar similar to the attributes for any table cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the class. 在代码中的以下页面``元素和``元素出现在区域中，提供相应在运行时控制正版 Web 部件功能。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, giving the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 请注意，``元素，它包含多个样式特性，适用于这两个区域中包含的 Web 部件控件的标题栏。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/CS/parttitlestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/VB/parttitlestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 构造函数设置的值属性`false`。The constructor sets the value of the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Wrap { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Wrap As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Wrap : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示部件控件标题的内容是否在标题栏中换行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the title bar for a part control wrap in the title bar.

value.span: 如果标题栏的内容在标题栏中换行，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the contents of a title bar wrap in the title bar; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类重写基属性，以便它可以将值设置为`false`。The class overrides the base property so that it can set the value to `false`. 设置属性`false`，因此，默认情况下，一个部分的控件的标题栏不允许其内容换行。The sets the property to `false`, so that by default, a title bar for a part control does not allow its contents to wrap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 在代码中的以下页面``元素和``元素出现在区域中，这可在运行时提供相应的控件正版 Web 部件功能。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, which gives the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 请注意，``元素，它包含多个样式特性，适用于这两个区域中包含的 Web 部件控件的标题栏。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. 此外请注意，``元素具有`wrap`和`width`属性。Notice also that the `` element has `wrap` and `width` attributes. 因为属性值设置为`true`，宽于分配给的值中的两个控件的标题栏的文本且`width`属性，每个控件的标题栏文本包装在浏览器中加载页面时。Because the property value is set to `true`, and the text in the title bars of the two controls is wider than the value assigned to the `width` attribute, the title bar text of each control wraps when the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/CS/parttitlestylewrapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/VB/parttitlestylewrapvb.aspx#1)]
